articles.author: Ali Salman
articles.title: Apple’s M4 MacBook Pro, Revamped Mac Mini, And 24-Inch iMac Launching “Very Soon” As It Invites Media Personnel For Hands-On - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple will launch the new M4 MacBook Pro, revamped Mac mini, and 24-inch iMac very soon according to a prominent analyst.
articles.content: Apple is gearing up to launch various Macs with M4 chip refresh, and it appears that the release will be sooner than expected. It was originally speculated that the M4 MacBook Pro, revamped Mac mini,… [+2613 chars]
